jobs.title: Training Centre Coordinator
jobs.jobDescription: JOb APP Kenya seeks a highly qualified Training Centre Coordinator to run/support the Training Centre and to provide training services for clients and employees. The role will include responsibility for ensuring that there is adequate and suitable training materials & schedules.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Promote the Training Centre to consultants, contractors, customers, Engineers and employees, Prepare and execute training programs
Receive and coordinate booking of courses by customers

jobRequirements.req: Minimum 4-5 years’ experience in the electrical engineering field
